title: Support main LF team.
body:
Howdy,

I've come back to LoL recently and am looking for a team to join for some ranked games. I feel that I can play support confidently, adc averagely and am currently re-learning jng (ive been away from the game until this last couple weeks for some time).
Am currently bouncing between the hell that is Bronze I and II, and it's starting to make my face hurt getting down-ranked constantly because of AFKs/trolls, so would like to find a competent, like-minded team.

Quick details about myself, 26 year old guy, live in WA. Am a dedicated endgame raider on WoW (top tier content), achieved rank 1 on HoTS (top rank possible), and have played my fair share of Dota back in the day.
I have played several other games competitively too, in the past. (Black Ops, BF1942 and the later BF franchises, Dota 2 BRIEFLY, CS S and CS GO, yada yada yada.)

Happy to commit to any evenings/nights, except for Weds and Sun (I run another team in another game on those nights).

IGN: **Kurizu**
Alternate account (been playing it a bit lately): **Kurizu Senpai**

I'm confident in my abilities as a support, but I am by no means a god. I'm always open to suggestions on how I could improve, as long as it's constructive.

Quick edit: Naturally, as my rank isn't that special I'm not expecting invites from any Gold/Plat/Higher teams, but if anyone did want to give me a shot, I'll do my best to not disappoint.
Other teams, your rank means little to me, I'll gladly join a team of any rank provided you are competent players and committed to progressing! ^_^
